text:
Jetti Ramya,, I have a confession to make apan 7-8 dosto me bas ek tum thi jisse hume darr lagta tha kyoki baaki sab se to hum just kidding bol ke bach jaate the lekin getting on the wrong side of Jetti was fatal as fuck.
Tumse pata nahi kab itna open ho gaye, bauhat bhari interovert Ramya Jetti Drams club me complete surprise thi, hum sab Drameve-1 waalo ke beech me aake phir tik hi gayi. Tumse dosti hui to ek bauhat kattar dushmani ke baad aur uske baad to chahe wo summer play me literally poora din sabka ostwal ke room me rehna ho ya Katiyar ki BT utana Jetti ke bina kuch nahi hota tha. 
(I have voluntarily decided to avoid talking about "THAT" topic) But still thank you for standing up for us when we needed the most.
Tum bhi end me sutts partner ho hi gayi to jaldi hi milte hai With a bottle of Vo**a in hand.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Loki bhai............. Tu God hai bro Tu GOD hai.
Aaj tak wo aadmi hume Banarasi Babu bulata aaya hai, wo insaan jiske performance se ache se intimidate ho jae Us Interpector Vajpayee to mere Har Har Mahadev.
Bhai pata hai abhi Ostwal aur Rochak ke bhi memoirs likhe hum lekin un dono me aur tere saath meri bonding me ek bauhat major difference hai. Ostwal ke room me bakchodi hoti thi jab Drams ke kaam se khali hoke aate the sab, lekin tumhare saath tab tab bonding hoti thi jab ye sab drams ke cordinator ka bhar sambhalte the aur hum aapke saath baith ke B-bot me dhoop sekte the. 
Chahe Shakuni mama ho ya Sunil Shetty Loki ki performance ke baad kisi ki himmat nahi hoti thi ki usko follow kare.... (Nipun try kiya ... yaad hai naa kya hua tha uske saath). Aur un sab ke baad bhi tere jitna down to Earth aadmi nai dekha yaar. Tumhare life me jo ch*d hue the unke baare me tum thoda bauhat batae the lekin un sab ko overcome karke tum kaise aage badh gaye wo bhi dekhe hai hum.
Yaar bhai baaki sab se to ye keh rahe hai ki milenge phir kabhi naa kabhi lekin tumse ek waada chahiye hume... bhai tere saath Amarnath jaana hai jab tum bolo jaha bhi honge sab chod ke chalenge lekin chalenge zaroor.
Actually a fan!
Banarasi Babu
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Haa bhai! Ostwal baaki sab to theek hai pehle ye bata.... sutts hai? Yaarrrr kya likhe teri tareef me... Yaar sach batae to kabhi soche nahi the ki TOA2 me AH Sir ki gaaliyan share karne ke baad ek din tere saath sutts share karenge aur in that process I will find one of my best friends in you.
Pata hai bro, tere determination aur kaam karne ke tareeke se day-1 se jalte the hum kyoki kitna bhi koshish kar lo wo Ostwal level ki zidd kabhi aayi hi nahi. Koi aadami summer me din bhar play me marwane ke baad bhi InterviewBit kholne ki himmat rakhe to wo bas Ostwal hi ho sakta hai.
Yaar tujhe yaad karo to wo InterIIT ki trip yaad aati hai. December ka mahina 5 degree temprature aur thanda paani. Usme Ostwal aur Rochak ka wo plan yaad aata hai ki nahate hai bc dekha jaega aur phir...... 5 min baad apne adjacent cubical se teri chillane ki aawaze yaad aati hai. Yaar tareef karna kabhi nahi aaya hume aur usko as sarcasm chupate aae hai but to be honest Nilay ke jaane ke baad tum hi wo 1 aadmi tha jisko hum personal baate bata sakte the without the risk of any leaks, chahe wo mere breakup ki baat ho ya Academic Warning ki, it was just you who I could trust it with.
Bhai itna kuch saath me dekhe hai hum log ki sirf Katiyar hi hai wo usko words me samjha sakta hai aur uske liye bhi usko ek poora gaana likhna hoga.
Aage ke liye kya hi bole, tu waise bhi kabhi room pe nahi bulata tha to abhi bhi bas khud sahi se rahiye hum tujhe aur sutts ko dhoondte party karne pauhach hi jaenge. 
Thanks Bhai
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Yaar wo Antaragni ke din probably sabse bakchod memories hai campus ke aur use tumhe mention nahi karte to complete nahi ho sakta . Partners in crime we bonded on just 2 word "Chod Hua" bas. Chahe kuch bhi ho jae palak ka phone aata tha to pata hota tha she'll start with judge maa ch*da rahe hai, Bache maa ch*da rahe hai ya Ratnesh maa ch*da raha hai....
Wo Anjan Srivastava ka "Us ladki do samjha dijiye" tha ya Ratnesh ka "Mai meditate karne jaa raha" tum hi thi jo shant reh leti thi, and still you were the one jiske saamne bachhon ki bakchodi karne ki himmat nahi hoti thi. Kaafi zyaada chapu time spend kiye hai tumhare saath chahe wo Hall-1 ho, events ground ya L-7. 
Bakchodi kayam rakhna, Umeed hai phir milenge.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
First of all, teri DP me ... that's my jacket. Nana bhai tere baare me kya hi bole, Orientation yaad hai hume jab tum pehli baar "Nana" kiye the and uske baad seedhe Antaragni17 jab nukkad ke beech me sab 3-4 year ke beech me ek first year aake chaap ke chala gaya tha. Tumse zyaada shayad hi kisi ki maare ho kabhi, lekin bhai tumhe miss bauhat karenge yaar. Tu 3rd year me Nipun ke room me kam hi aata tha, volleyball me gayab rehta tha lekin uske baad bhi kitna bhi gariya le Nana ke aana se party ka mazaa badh jaata tha. 
Now I 100% agree ki humare group me most probably I was the one wo sabse zyaada maara hai tumhari, chahe wo IIT Roorkee me sube sube tumhare gayab hone pe tumhari maarna ho ya uske bas 1 hi din baad zabaradasti tumse poore Y17 ko treat dilwana lekin yaar in sab me sorry nahi bol rahe hum kyoki tu tha yaar, nana mast aadmi hai isiliye to ye sab ar lete the nana ke saath isiliye to aaj se 2 saal pehle tere saath photo khichwae the ye soch ke ki ye to As we leave ka portrait hoga.
Tum un logo me ho jo abhi kuch din aur campus ki shobha badhenge to tum to chinta mat karo aate rahenge kam se kam 1 saal aur aapke maze lene aur aapke saath legend level ka Volleyball khelne.
Maze me rehna bro nana ki bakchodi kabhi kam nahi honi chahiye.
.......

Ohh fuckk, I almost forgot to talk about that nighttt........ uske bina ye memoir complete hi nahi ho sakta.... Yaar me Has Kyu raha ho. Wo raat jab Piyush Sunil Samartha ko Alan aur Rochak first time me poora joint phhokwa diye the aur Nana meri bas ek line "Suffering from Success" pe pehle 1 ghanta hasa aur phir 1 ghanta roya tha.... Bhai aaj tak kisi ko pata nahi us din tere dimaag me kya chal raha the. Aur bhai agli baar aae to yaad rakhna phir se wo OAT waali photo khichwaenge.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Argal Sahab Namaskaar, Tumhara bio padhe to raha nahi gaya, wo last line Antaragni management team me g**d ghiswane me hum bhi aapke saath the. Tum chapu aadmi ho yaar, I know bauhat garyae hai tumhe bauhat lade hai lekin un sab me pata tha ki kitna bhi gariya lo Ratnedha Argal apne kaam aadha nahi chodega. 
Hum yaad hai Antaragni ke 1 din pehle tumse kahe the ki bhai ho sakta hai fest ke time tumpe ukhad jae hum please personally mat lena aur tumhara reply tha wo sab ki chinta mat kar lekin uske baad sach me uski chinta nahi karni padi, kitna bhi kuch bhi hua ho but we managed it and we did it nicely.
Thanks yaar for everything you are one of the most patient people I know. Jaldi milte hai dost
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
oyy yaarr... chalo naa.... Bas yahi aata hai Rochak Dindor ke baare me socho to yahi sabse pehle yaad aata hai. Hands down the most fun person I knew in campus. Kitna bhi kharaab mood ho kitni bhi serious baat ho Rochak Dindor can take any topic and make it about chal m**l maarte hai bc.
Although Aasman Gir Raha Hai me saath me the lekin I got to know the real Dindor during the brief practice of NSS nukkad. Kaala chasma lagae full swag me TS karta hua, itna ziddi ki nukkad khatam hone ke baad bhi apna 4-liner bol ke hi gaya.
Iske baad tumse dosti hui Summer me, Jab Aayush Ostwal was the Prop manager aur hum dono unke atyacharo se pareshaan hoke usko gariyate the aur in the end lad ke hi sahi kaam kar lete the. Also how can I forget Rochak DIndor the bad cop..... The most fun guy turned into a bad cop kyoki usi me to asli fun hai. Kedia se inspire hoke wo bachho ki maari thi ki hum dono bilkul opposite reasons se drameve-1 me bachon ke beech popular ho gaye the.
Abhi thodi der pehle KT ke memoir me tune likha tha ki Varun ka Sarcasm Aishwarya se kam hai.... honoured but I have a similar comparison to make...... Nana kitni bhi koshish karle Rochak ki bakchodi kabhi match nahi kar paega.
Saale tum msgs ke end me alvida to likh rahe ho lekin jaan lo ki tum officer ban jao chahe Pradhan Matri sutta lene tumhe hi phone karenge hum. Aur naa tumhe bhoolne denge kyoki jo scenes specially 2nd year Antaragni me apan milke banae the uske baad we are crime mates forever.
Bhai bauhat kuch hai tere baare me kehne ko to lekin ....... ab man nahi hai! Aapki shayari aur Ostwal ke liye innovative innovative gaaliyan sunne ka bada man karta hai..
Badalna mat be aur maa mat ch**ana kabhi milne ko bole to..
Baaki to Dindori baba zindabad hai the aur rahenge. Har Har Mahadev
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Varun Jain ....... Yaar pata hai Drameve-1 me to utni nahi hui thi tumse bonding but NSS nukkad me jo Varun Jain ki image thi mere man me wo thi, an not very hard to convince guy who is barely comfortable in the circle but boyyyyyy was I wrong. Us NSS nukkad ke baad 3 saal almost continously tumhare saath the and I saw the most strong willed person I know, Y17 to chodo Y16 waale bhi 2 log aate the baaki sab to batana aur baaki 2 jaate the Varun Jain ko manane. Also, you were the most comfortable person I ever saw in the circle. Hume yaad hai hum, tum aur Nipun gaye the dram treat ke liye paise lene aur koi bola tha tumse ki tum same tatti itni confidently kar kaise lete ho......
Itne performances kiye apan saath me chahe wo tumhara legendary role as Jamal (ya fazlu) ho ya the super legendary performance as Assistant Director Hamlet ho but apni bonding kaha hui ye shayad hume, tumhe aur Barwal ko hi pata hoga. IIT Roorkee ke wo mess ke chakkar yaar, those were the best times ever.
Yaar itnii memories hai ki kya kya batae, tera wo anokha negotiation at Dram Treat ya handling both Y18 and Y16 with the same attitude. I seriously I'll ever come across some one as relaxed as you. And ofcourse, this memoir would be incomplete without talking about the longest running credential in both of ours life.... Sexist Hall 12 + Aishwarya. Yaar aaj us baat ko 2 saal se zyaada ho gaye lekin abhi tak nahi samajh aaya tu kiya kya tha..... Mera to hume yaad hai that I was the one jo pehli chingaari diye the but tera aaj tak nahi pata. But still anyone who still doesn't know Varun Jain wo bas isse usko judge kar le ki Seniors nahi, Legacy nahi, Galaxy nahi the only reason why one of the Teams (None in particular) gave there all was to say at the end ki Varun Jain MC hai... 
You are a legend bro, chaapte raho aur teri ek hi baat thi ho placement ke us time me hume rukne ki nahi ..... ki tu ek company ke 2 tests nikala hai mere to mila ke 2 nahi nikale hai ....
All the best bhai aur jaldi milte hai Nipun ke room pe.... To the most excited sober at a party of Drunks.... Chaapte raho.

Y17 Fakr Hai,
A fellow Sexist
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal
